name: Hilton Macdonald Hassell
description: Hilton Hassell OSA, RCA art gallery video game for PC/VR.. made with Unreal4.2 mouse/keyboard or Xbox controller..  aprox 700 paintings (not intended to be a complete list of Hassells work we also apologize for the slides some of which are 60 years old and are badly degraded some are "photoshopped" some i just left as is..  also the aspect ratio is wrong on most of them some look flattened or pinched(Unreal likes tiff or targa with power of 2 eg. 2x2, 512x1024, 8192x4096.. ))
